statements: SELECT museum_name, location FROM art_museums;
SELECT * FROM art_museums WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT museum_name, total_artworks FROM art_museums WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT museum_name, established_year FROM art_museums ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_museums FROM art_museums;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM art_museums WHERE established_year < 1900
SELECT * FROM art_museums WHERE total_artworks > 1000 ORDER BY museum_name DESC
SELECT museum_name, location, total_artworks FROM art_museums WHERE location='Paris' OR location='New York' ORDER BY total_artworks DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_museums, SUM(total_artworks) AS total_artworks FROM art_museums
SELECT museum_name, established_year FROM art_museums WHERE established_year >= 2000 ORDER BY established_year ASC
SELECT * FROM museums;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM museums ORDER BY museum_name DESC;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM museums WHERE museum_id = 2;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, year_created FROM artworks WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT museum_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM museums JOIN artworks ON museums.museum_id = artworks.museum_id GROUP BY museum_name ORDER BY total_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM museums WHERE location='New York';
SELECT museum_name, location FROM museums ORDER BY museum_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS num_artworks FROM artworks GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_artworks > 1;
SELECT museum_name, artwork_name, year_created FROM museums JOIN artworks ON museums.museum_id = artworks.museum_id WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900;
SELECT DISTINCT museum_name FROM museums JOIN artworks ON museums.museum_id = artworks.museum_id WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Vincent%' ORDER BY museum_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM art_museums;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM art_museums;
SELECT * FROM art_pieces WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT piece_name, year_created FROM art_pieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitors WHERE museum_id = 3;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM art_museums;
SELECT piece_name, artist_name, year_created FROM art_pieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitors WHERE museum_id = 1;
SELECT museum_name, COUNT(piece_id) AS total_pieces FROM art_museums JOIN art_pieces ON art_museums.museum_id = art_pieces.museum_id GROUP BY museum_name;
SELECT art_pieces.piece_name, art_museums.museum_name FROM art_pieces JOIN art_museums ON art_pieces.museum_id = art_museums.museum_id WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY museum_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArtMuseums;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM ArtMuseums WHERE museum_id = 1;
SELECT museum_id, museum_name, location FROM ArtMuseums ORDER BY museum_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ArtCollections WHERE museum_id = 2 ORDER BY collection_name;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM ArtArtists WHERE artist_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM ArtMuseums;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM ArtMuseums ORDER BY museum_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT museum_name FROM ArtMuseums WHERE location LIKE 'New%';

SELECT ArtWorks.work_title, ArtArtists.artist_name, ArtMuseums.museum_name FROM ArtWorks INNER JOIN ArtArtists ON ArtWorks.artist_id = ArtArtists.artist_id INNER JOIN ArtCollections ON ArtWorks.collection_id = ArtCollections.collection_id INNER JOIN ArtMuseums ON ArtCollections.museum_id = ArtMuseums.museum_id;

SELECT ArtWorks.work_title, ArtArtists.artist_name, ArtMuseums.museum_name FROM ArtWorks INNER JOIN ArtArtists ON ArtWorks.artist_id = ArtArtists.artist_id INNER JOIN ArtCollections ON ArtWorks.collection_id = ArtCollections.collection_id INNER JOIN ArtMuseums ON ArtCollections.museum_id = ArtMuseums.museum_id WHERE ArtArtists.artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM Museum;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM Museum WHERE museum_id = 1;
SELECT artist_name FROM Artist ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibition WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT visitor_name, email FROM Visitor WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Artwork;
SELECT artist_name, nationality FROM Artist ORDER BY nationality DESC;
SELECT museum_name, location FROM Museum WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT exhibition_name, start_date, end_date FROM Exhibition WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM Visitor WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
